pages.text: To get The Aurorian, you first must do some mining and skeleton hunting! (Or at least have the resources available for the next recipe)

pages.name: Aurorian Stone
pages.text: First you're going to need to gather some $(#008cff)Lapis$(), $(#008cff)Stone$(), $(#008cff)Clay$(), and $(#008cff)Bones$(). You can then craft those together to get yourself $(#008cff)Aurorian Stone$()

pages.name: Aurorian Portal Bricks
pages.text: $(#008cff)Aurorian Stone$() can then be used to craft the portal frame. Once you have at least 10 you can make the portal!

pages.name: Aurorian Portal
pages.text: Also you can make the portal larger just like the nether portal if you like.

pages.title: Light The Portal!
pages.text: Now use $(#008cff)Flint and Steel$() to light it! If you're in The Aurorian you can use two $(#008cff)Silentwood Sticks$(), one in each hand, to light the portal also!$(br2)$(l)Note: Items used to light the portal are found in The Aurorian config file.
$(#008cff)$(o)Now you finished the portal, step on in and explore the dimension!
